tool_description: This simple to use Translation API is cost effective as well as simple with only two end points
name: Translation API
title: Translation API

api_list.name: ListSupportedLanguages
api_list.description: Use This to Get All The Allowed Languages for Translation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api8.p.rapidapi.com/ListSupportedLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api8.p.rapidapi.com/ListSupportedLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
